Macquarie School: And essential tool for the future.
In today's world, the English language is essential to broaden horizons both at the work and academic levels and it is also a passport to travel anywhere in the world.
There is a sense of purpose and the students are focused and happy to be a part of our learning community.
There is a structure, but within that structure we have creativity and originality that sets our school apart from other schools.
Come with us and ask us for an appointment. You can make a level test.This way we tell you what is the best group and type of learning according for your needed.
The regular class become at march.Anyway you can add with us a long of current year, always we have new group and new possibilities to learn.
Our institution was created with the purpose of improving the teaching and learning of English.

Our mission is to teach the language within a pleasant and enjoyable atmosphere, focusing on a high comunicative level, practical and accesible, developing a globalizing approach, fostering interest in the Anglo saxon culture.
                               To do so, we make use of innovative methodologies implementing up-to-date teaching tools such as ICT resources and designing new materials for different leverls and ages; supporting and encouraging continuous aducaction programmes and activities leading for international certification; designing and developing different projects and organizing inmersion programmes for students.
Some of the strategies used in class:

Student-centred teaching promoting their involvement. At the same time this promotes mutual cooperation from students and teachers.
Flexible and facilitating teaching keeping in mind the different learning styles.
We offer language services to individuals and companies.
Advice, evaluation and planning of in-company language training. Public translations. Literary and technical translations. Interpretations.
